heroSection.title: Meet Our Expert Doctors
heroSection.subtitle: Our team combines medical expertise with genuine compassion to deliver exceptional healthcare

introSection.title: Our team combines medical expertise with genuine compassion
introSection.description: Each of our doctors brings years of specialized training and experience, combined with a deep commitment to patient care.

doctors.name: Dr. Rajesh Sharma
doctors.description: Leading cardiologist with 20+ years of experience in interventional cardiology and heart surgery.

doctors.name: Dr. Priya Patel
doctors.description: Expert neurologist specializing in stroke care, epilepsy treatment, and neurodegenerative disorders.

doctors.name: Dr. Amit Kumar
doctors.description: Skilled orthopedic surgeon with expertise in joint replacement and sports medicine.

doctors.name: Dr. Sunita Reddy
doctors.description: Compassionate pediatrician dedicated to providing comprehensive care for children of all ages.

doctors.name: Dr. Vikram Singh
doctors.description: Expert eye specialist with advanced training in cataract surgery and retinal treatments.

doctors.name: Dr. Kavya Nair
doctors.description: Renowned dermatologist specializing in skin care, cosmetic procedures, and dermatological surgery.
